conversation.content:
**guidelines:**

Above is list of categories. Your task will be to classify the user input below. I also want you to extract a relevant entities for the chosen category only if they are present in the input.
- Each category has a unique ID associated with it in alphanumeric format. Each category has its name and description.
If no category can be identified, please return: {“prediction_category”: “none _of_the_above”}. 

- For each category there are also slots associated with them. Those are unique values that need to be retrieved for a particular category.  Each Attribute has a name, Attribute-Id and may also include "possible-values", which means the slot must match one of the provided values. 


Use the following format for your response:
{
"category": "category_id",
"attributes": [
{
"attribute id 1": "value 1",
"attribute id 2": "value 2"...
}
]
}

**utterance**

I request to deactivate the accounts for the following employees who are no longer with the company:
Michael Jackson Michael.jackson@company.com, Galileo Galilei Galileo.galilei@company.com
